name: Jevil Retro Recreation
description:
Fight against Jevil again in a familiar retro style, all on your browser!

WASD / Arrow Keys - Movement
Z / Enter - Confirm
F4 - Fullscreen

Once more, this project is open-source!
CHAOS CHAOS!

Please support Toby Fox and the Deltarune team by buying the album!https://tobyfox.bandcamp.com


♥ Lovingly made with the Godot engine.
